page.title: 15LOCAL GOVERNMENT
page.content: The estate is located there because it is near the edge of a town and so land is cheaper.The council are giving grants to encourage firms to build their factories in the town.Also there are built there because it was allready flat land and that means they wouldn't have to pay money to get it levelled.It provides easy access for the workforce using either bus or private transport. The changes that are occuring involve the steelworks running down,and the landscaping of wasteland around the factories.
